title: Electrical Engineer - Camera Hardware
summary: Do you love taking on big challenges that require exceptionally creative solutions? Do you deeply understand how an incredible camera experience should work? As part of our Camera Technologies group, you’ll help design the innovative technology that allows each generation of Apple products to produce photos even more incredible than the last.
description:
-  Investigate forward-looking technology, feature and silicon for camera hardware.
-  Schematic creation, including image sensor, low-noise power supply, image stabilization circuit, and high-speed interfaces, etc.
-  Supervise and review layout design for substrate, flex and PCB.
-  Interact with product team to ensure good implementation for system integration.
-  Close collaboration with peer teams for camera performance optimization.
key_qualifications:
Expertise in electronic design, including component selection, schematic creation, and hands on with mainstream tool-chains.
Broad experience with both analog and digital circuits, e.g. small signal conditioning, low noise power supply, Gbps high-speed and embedded control interfaces.
Strong knowledge of layout strategies for material selection, stack-up planning, EMI minimization, signal integrity and noise suppression.
Comfort and ability to use all types of electronic test equipments.
Capable of managing different projects in parallel.
Great interpersonal skills and comfortable to work in a team environment.
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience.
additional_requirements:
- Knowledge of image sensor and camera module hardware design.
- Experience in using Matlab or other simulation tools is a plus.
- Cellular/Wireless awareness: 5G, LTE, BT, WiFi, UWB, NFC, etc.
